"Great place to get blinds for windows" "They solved problems other vendors wouldn't try to work out." "Again you have been warned there is not enough room to maneuver!"

Very tight place for delivering. Do not recommend any Sleeper cabs with 53ft trailer as there is not enough room to maneuver into dock due to the other business at this location having their fleet cars parked everywhere. You will be in a … More

Mike repaired a wood blind that I had not purchased through the company.  After calling other shade companies for help I brought the shade to Tex-Sun and it was repaired on the spot.  Excellent customer service!  Thank you!

Tex-Sun Shade Specialties Rocks!!!  I live in an apt in Uptown and had a motorized darkening shade installed and it has been a game changer. They are responsive, are great to work with, and do great!!!
